channel.title: Help with NPCs hitting super high
channel.description: The NPCs on my server hit super high. A lvl 2 man hit's through my lvl 126 cmb and 99 def. He hit 22 max on me. How do I change it? Also, when I try to equip my prayer cape, it says I need 99 prayer. The prayer is 97/99 how do I fix that?

item.title: Help with NPCs hitting super high
item.dc:creator: @Barrage1 Denoria
item.description:
@Barrage1 wrote:

Well if you cannot understand a simple java method, and say ‘wat’ don’t make a server, it will be leached.

~ Sorry to be harsh.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with NPCs hitting super high
item.dc:creator: @EpidemicClan EpidemicClan
item.description:
@EpidemicClan wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:2, topic:283510”]NPCHandler for the hitting,

hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(#);

Post the method used for equipping and checking the level for the cape.[/quote]

O.o Wat?
